title: Cant find my mouse cursor on 4K monitor
body: In Windows 10, using 4K monitor, mouse cursor and text of everything become too small to see.  Any solution for that?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, League doesn't full support 4K yet. This makes some of the UI and the mouse pretty small. Sometimes this can be worked around by going into your **INTERFACE** settings and cranking up the sliders to make some of the UI larger. Other times, the small UI is caused by running in Full Screen mode and *Alt+Tabbing* out of the match. Running in a Borderless mode can resolve issues caused by *Alt+Tabbing* most of the time.

Let me know if you have any questions.
